SEARCH
Module com.example.milionerzy
Package com.example.milionerzy

Class EndingScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.milionerzy.EndingScreen
public class EndingScreen extends Object
The `EndingScreen` class represents the controller for the ending screen in the Milionerzy (Who Wants to Be a Millionaire) application. It displays the final score, question, and correct answer (if applicable) and allows the user to navigate back to the main menu.
